cmd_|-get-uuids_|-blkid -s UUID lun1 lun.name: blkid -s UUID lun1 lun2 lun3

changes.stdout:
lun1: UUID="uuid1" 
  lun2: UUID="uuid2"
lun3: UUID="uuid3"

cmd_|-get-uuids_|-blkid -s UUID lun1 lun.comment: Command "blkid -s UUID lun1 lun2 lun3" run

cmd_|-get-uuids_|-blkid -s UUID lun1 lun.name: blkid -s UUID lun1 lun2 lun3 lun4

lun1: UUID="uuid1"
  lun2: UUID="uuid2"
lun3: UUID="uuid3"
lun4: UUID="uuid4"

cmd_|-get-uuids_|-blkid -s UUID lun1 lun.comment: Command "blkid -s UUID lun1 lun2 lun3 lun4" run
